00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Interface to Core, IO and DDR Clock.
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 #ifndef __CVMX_CLOCK_H__
00048 #define __CVMX_CLOCK_H__
00049 
00050 #ifdef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_KERNEL
00051 #include <asm/octeon/octeon.h>
00052 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx-lmcx-defs.h>
00053 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx-fpa-defs.h>
00054 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx-tim-defs.h>
00055 #else
00056 #include "cvmx.h"
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00060 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00061 extern "C" {
00062 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 /**
00066  * Enumeration of different Clocks in Octeon.
00067  */
00068 typedef enum {
00069     CVMX_CLOCK_RCLK,
00070                 /**< Clock used by cores, coherent bus and L2 cache. */
00071     CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK,
00072                 /**< Clock used by IO blocks. */
00073     CVMX_CLOCK_DDR,
00074                 /**< Clock used by DRAM */
00075     CVMX_CLOCK_CORE,
00076                 /**< Alias for CVMX_CLOCK_RCLK */
00077     CVMX_CLOCK_TIM,
00078                 /**< Alias for CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK */
00079     CVMX_CLOCK_IPD,
00080                 /**< Alias for CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK */
00081 } cvmx_clock_t;
00082 
00083 /**
00084  * Get cycle count based on the clock type.
00085  *
00086  * @param clock - Enumeration of the clock type.
00087  * @return      - Get the number of cycles executed so far.
00088  */
00089 static inline uint64_t cvmx_clock_get_count(cvmx_clock_t clock)
00090 {
00091     switch (clock) {
00092     case CVMX_CLOCK_RCLK:
00093     case CVMX_CLOCK_CORE:
00094         {
00095 #ifndef __mips__
00096             if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00097                 || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00098                 || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX))
00099                 return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_FPA_CLK_COUNT);
00100             return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_IPD_CLK_COUNT);
00101 #elif defined(CVMX_ABI_O32)
00102             uint32_t tmp_low, tmp_hi;
00103 
00104             asm volatile ("   .set push                    \n"
00105                       "   .set mips64r2                \n"
00106                       "   .set noreorder               \n"
00107                       "   rdhwr %[tmpl], $31           \n"
00108                       "   dsrl  %[tmph], %[tmpl], 32   \n"
00109                       "   sll   %[tmpl], 0             \n"
00110                       "   sll   %[tmph], 0             \n" "   .set pop                 \n":[tmpl] "=&r"(tmp_low),[tmph] "=&r"(tmp_hi):);
00111 
00112             return (((uint64_t) tmp_hi << 32) + tmp_low);
00113 #else
00114             uint64_t cycle;
00115             CVMX_RDHWR(cycle, 31);
00116             return (cycle);
00117 #endif
00118         }
00119     case CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK:
00120     case CVMX_CLOCK_IPD:
00121         if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00122             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00123             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX))
00124             return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_FPA_CLK_COUNT);
00125         return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_IPD_CLK_COUNT);
00126     case CVMX_CLOCK_TIM:
00127         if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00128             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00129             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX))
00130             return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_TIM_FR_RN_CYCLES);
00131         return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_IPD_CLK_COUNT);
00132 
00133     case CVMX_CLOCK_DDR:
00134         if (OCTEON_IS_OCTEON2() || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3())
00135             return cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_LMCX_DCLK_CNT(0));
00136         else
00137             return ((cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_LMCX_DCLK_CNT_HI(0)) << 32) | cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_LMCX_DCLK_CNT_LO(0)));
00138     }
00139 
00140     cvmx_dprintf("cvmx_clock_get_count: Unknown clock type\n");
00141     return 0;
00142 }
00143 #ifdef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_KERNEL
00144 static inline uint64_t cvmx_clock_get_rate(cvmx_clock_t clock)
00145 {
00146     switch (clock) {
00147     case CVMX_CLOCK_RCLK:
00148     case CVMX_CLOCK_CORE:
00149         return octeon_get_clock_rate();
00150     case CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK:
00151     case CVMX_CLOCK_TIM:
00152     case CVMX_CLOCK_IPD:
00153         return octeon_get_io_clock_rate();
00154     default:
00155         WARN_ON(1);
00156         return 0;
00157     }
00158 }
00159 #define cvmx_clock_get_rate_node(a,b) cvmx_clock_get_rate(b)
00160 #else
00161 extern uint64_t cvmx_clock_get_rate(cvmx_clock_t clock);
00162 extern uint64_t cvmx_clock_get_rate_node(int node, cvmx_clock_t clock);
00163 #endif
00164 
00165 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00166 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00167 }
00168 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00169 #endif
00170 
00171 #endif /* __CVMX_CLOCK_H__ */
